Class ExtendedPrintable.Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.ExtendedPrintable.Factory

    ExtendedPrintable

    public static final class ExtendedPrintable.Factory
extends Object
    Provides factory methods for creating ExtendedPrintables

    • Method Detail

      • getExtendedPrintableForTextComponent

        @Deprecated
public static ExtendedPrintable getExtendedPrintableForTextComponent(JTextComponent ep)
        Deprecated. use createExtendedPrintable(javax.swing.JComponent) instead
        returns an ExtendedPrintable that is capable of rendering the supplied JEditorPane.
        Parameters:
        ep - The JTextComponent to be printed
        Returns:
        The ExtendedPrintable

      • createExtendedPrintable

        public static ExtendedPrintable createExtendedPrintable(JComponent component)
        Creates an ExtendedPrintable for a JComponent. The implementation has special handling for scroll panes, tables and text components to create something nice in those cases. In other cases it just prints the entire component in a single page
        Parameters:
        component - the component to create an ExtendedPrintable for
        Returns:
        an ExtendedPrintable for a JComponent
        Since:
        API 4.60 (Geneious 5.6.0)
